column2:
"Ah,<%me>.
What a coincidence."
"I wanted to interact with the Lillipans, thus I asked Fourier for help but...."
"Lilili!\u3000Lilili!"

"Hey, its fine...
Matoi is part of ARKS,
She isn't an enemy."

"I can't help you.
I have no idea why is it getting
all worked up."

"I wonder what have I done
for it to be so aggressive to me."

"That couldn't be the case.
After all, I was the first person
that got along with him."
"Li!\u3000Lili!\u3000Lilili!"

"Hmm... It seems to be trying to
stop you from going further
as opposed to aggression."

"Looks like it only has issues
with Matoi... Does anyone know why?"

"Mm... I don't remember doing
anything here before..."
"1. It could be something in the past. "
"2. No point brooding over it."
"I give up... I can't recall anything."

"Yes, you are right. It could be
something I have done in past
that I forgot about."

"Thanks Fourier. I don't wish
to disturb the Lillipans any
further. Guess I'll head back now."

"Sorry Matoi, I was not of any
help to you."

"Don't say that, inviting this
Lillipan here is more than enough."

"All these while, I only heard
stories about them. For me to
be able to meet them makes me
really happy."

"Let's visit them together again?
I am sure the Lillipans would
welcome you the next time we
visit."
"Yes, definitely."
